title: Type ID: Johnson GT 200
content:
Please help me identify the font used on this decal. Note: this is part of a Johnson boat motor.

I have been able to find some near matches--like Agency and Bank Gothic--but have not been able to find a match with the horizontal terminal on the G and the correct slope on the 2.

Thank you for any help you can provide,

Duncan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031409im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Johnson-logo-typesample-3_6465.jpg)
author: duncan

comments.content:
How about Eurostile Bold Extended?

- Mike Yanega

I concur with Mike. I have that as an Adobe Font: Eurostile Bold Extended Two.

Stan

Thanks guys. I think you're right. I really appreciate your help.

Regards,

Duncan
